reviews.review: Pretty Good Job So Far

At the time of writing this review, I have played almost 250 hours of this game. It took me about 200 hours before I felt like I had the bare minimum of skill required to be competent in this game, which I think is a really good thing. This game is a time sink with a high skill ceiling, plain and simple. And yet, unlike other high skill, time sink games like Team Fortress 2 or Counter Strike: Global Offensive, I still have the same passion to play this game that I did when I first started. While the game has a multitude of issues, such as balancing problems and a seemingly unlimited supply of glitches, those problems still haven't kept me from playing 200 hours, and I honestly don't think they will keep me from playing 2,000.

Oh, and that's only 50% of the game, seeing as how I only play Survivor.

EDIT: This game fucking sucks. Do yourself a favor and never interact with it. Ever.
This game is amazing!!!

Я граю в дбд с самого её начала. В самом её старте меня затянула сама концепция игры: четверо сурвов должны общими усилями починить 5 генераторов и не отдаться коварному. злому и опасному маньяку(да, маньяку, в начале игры был один траппер). Сейчас игра преобразилась до неузнаваемости: куча перков, куча сурвов и маньяков, куча тактик игры. Приобретая огромное разнообразие контента, игра теряет свой первоначальный замысел и приобретает множество негативных граней, однако эта та игра, которая определенно стоит своих денег
UDP.
Игра, с которой у меня связаны весьма приятные моменты жизни, превратилась из прекрасного сурвайвл- хоррора, нацеленного на командную работу, в недо- ммоРПГ для выкачиваня денег на скинчики и новые ДЛСшки. Перестал играть еще на з@лупном монстре из странных дел, хотя ливать надо было еще раньше. От прежнего дбд, который так любят старички, не осталось ничего, кроме названия. Теперь эта игра называется "собери билд для более эффективных и греющих ж0пу догонялок"

한방퍽(살인마가 한방에 사람을 눕히는 퍽), 바베큐앤칠리(갈고리에 걸자마자 다른 놈 잡으러 갈 수 있게 위치가 보이는 퍽)

그렇다고 살인마를 하기에는 글쎄요; 생존자들이더군요 티배깅은 기본이고 한놈 잡고 다 탈출하고 재미를 느끼기가 힘들더군요

이 게임은 본인이 게임 심리전 진짜 잘 하거나 잘하는 친구가 도와줄 거 아니면 비추천입니다.
다만 진입장벽이 높긴 합니다만 어느 정도 할 줄 알게 되면 살인마, 생존자 모두 재미있습니다.
지나친 캠핑, 지나친 티배깅을 자제하여 깨끗한 게임을 유저들끼리 만들어갔으면 좋겠습니다.

장점: 특유의 분위기, 긴장감과 살인 욕구를 고조시키는 BGM, 간드러지는 배경, 재미있는 온라인 게임 방식

Эту игру любишь и ненавидишь. Катку назад ты был Богом и вот уже две катки подряд тебя унижают от души...
+ Каждая катка интересна своим набором. Даже если вы в фулл пати, то маньяк устроит вам квест и скучно не будет
- Пока идет поиск игры ты успеваешь сделать чай, поспать, слетать на другой континент, переспать с куртизанкой. А иногда не успеваешь даже сменить перки
- Ваша клавиатура не факт, что доживет
+ Новая клавиатура в комплекте с руками из плеч и вот вы имеете 3 престижа и 1 ранг
- Вылетает игра, вылетает катка и при этом ты теряешь предметы
- Последнее время много читаков, которые даже не пытаются это скрыть
+ Можно кидать репорты
+ Лор: да, он есть и его интересно изучать самомму, читать на wiki или вовсе додумывать детали самому

На самом деле, не смотря на минусы рекомендую ее. Скучно не будет. Конечно, если вы не зануда.

I have a toxic relationship with this game, but so far seems to be going in a good direction. But honestly, the only reason I play this game is because i want to have a "slumber party" with all these damn studs omfg..

I have a complicated relationship with this game, but i'm to the point where i can comfortably say i really enjoy it.

I started out being too afraid to do much of anything useful. This was back in October 2017 when I bought the game on sale to play with friends who had already been playing. We played some kill your friends together to get the hang of the controls and objectives.
After that we jumped into Survive With Friends where we were afraid, but we were afraid together. I'll never forget the time we were all sitting in the open exit gate area and Freddy Krueger popped some sort of perk that blocked the exits for a period of time and we all panicked and ran around laughing and freaking out.

But then we started playing less because it was frustrating waiting any where from five to fifteen minutes to get into another game if one of us died early and had to sit around and wait for the others.

Shortly after The Pig DLC was released, a friend and I decided to play some ol DBD cause nothing else sounded fun to play. First game of the night was with The Pig. We knew it was her because we saw the puzzle boxes. I started working on a generator and after twenty seconds i see her about fifteen feet away stalking me and it scares THE SHIRT out of me. I mean I threw my mouse away and half closed my laptop, screaming WHAT THE FORK in a VERY high pitched tone. To my credit, I hadn't been playing seriously and all other killers (besides the shape, but he was tall) had a terror radius that I relied on along with my friends callouts to avoid any surprises. Well that night with the Pig, i only played two more games, still shaken up. I even had a nightmare that i was being stalked in my own home by Hillbilly and Doctor.

That next morning I decided I had to face my fears. No one was online so I logged in and jumped into queue alone. And you know what? I had so much fun. And I still do! I almost exclusively solo-queue and now I play more Killer too! Today I bought the Halloween DLC and i had a BLAST playing The Shape, no wonder everyone reccommends it! 

Remember that it is a multiplayer game, so expect a certain amount of toxicity, but I've found that as long as you throw the ol GG in at the end, people seems to hold onto their EZs.

This game gets a lot of hate for being such a creative, immersive, and addictive experience. It's not just one way to play, it's many. The bugs have been annoying at times, but I think DBD is at a great place right now. 

I don't play any games like DBD and I wouldn't have thought this was going to be something I'd like, but it's one of my favorites to play after a long day in the office and I'm glad I gave it a chance! :)

Old Review below.  Devs have been working hard to stabilize power gap between Survivor and Killer.  Not perfect but much better than the past.  Will submit full re-review after another 100-200 hours back in the game.  +EDIT+ After being back, game has shown really good signs of a turn-around.  Balance is better than before; the only problem newer players may encounter is killers/survivors with over 1000 hours in the game de-ranking to newbie ranks in order to curbstomp newer players.  Frustrating as all hell, but push through it and know they are not in every match.  Archives and the Rift are quite nice, I love getting more lore and they're all voiced which is cool.  


+ OLD REVIEW + 

Not recommended in it's current form.  Was my favorite game to play, but each patch introduces more and more bugs, old exploits are never addressed or fixed, and devs are completely deaf to half the community.  Forums are some of the most toxic you will ever see, which is to be expected in an assymetrical game, the problem is that as the game continues, balance is becoming increasingly one-sided. 
In it's simplest form, game is 1 killer vs. 4 survivors.  While survivors have number advantage, killer is (supposedly) more powerful to offest this.  The problem is that many of the perks Survivors can acquire to strengthen themselves is about getting information (where other survivors are, where the killer is, etc).  The game is literally balanced around a team of survivors who can NOT communicate in real-time, but instead have to use their own cunning and awareness to succeed. 
Once the devs allowed friends on steam to team-up (and thereby introduced Discord voice comms to a game *built* on this NOT being an option), it's just gotten worse and worse.  
Far from being the singular powerful entity, Killers at this juncture are reduced to simpering morons who can only hope to win the game through the mistakes of the Survivors.  If you get lucky and pull a game against an organized 4-man team of friends with voice comms?  They will toy with you and watch you flail helplessly, powerless to actually do anything that might win you the game.
This measure of balance is brought up over and over again by high-profile streamers -and- the devs themsevles in their weekly livestreams, but they have taken a hard stance that nothing is wrong and put their heads in the sand ... presumably, because they either don't know *how* to fix their game or just don't want to bother putting the effort in.
Game is now just an excuse to release and sell new licensed Killers as DLC, but each release sees more and more bugs that never get fixed.  Map exploits and bugs like getting stuck trying to walk between two trees due to model collision are ignored ... in fact, they only actually have ONE developer who works on the maps themselves, and he's usually kept busy creating new maps to sell more DLC faster, rather than fix the problems with the existing ones.
It's a sad state of affairs at this point, and a quick trip to the forums will show you how divisive and angry the community is with each other and the developers -- this game has already peaked, and will begin a slow decline now.  I myself, as a Killer main, already moved on after getting sick of punishing myself trying to play against an opponent who not only outnumbers you 4-to-1, but is also stronger than you mechanic wise.
I am not kidding that some of the top streamers of this game have already made community challenges, videos, etc to point out that Killers can *only* succeed and win based on Survivors screwing up.  Meaning once you hit high ranks against organized teams, you are in most cases guaranteed to lose (unless you hit the lottery and face 4 randoms who are boosted).
If you're thinking of jumping onto this ship now, don't feel disheartened that it's not what you expected.  The good days are over, and there's nothing left now but the decline ... which the devs seem all to happy to oblige.

"Killer is frustrating and unbalanced?  Just try playing Survivor then, or play something else (Civilization V)."  Statement from the game lead pretty much says it all.

I have over 500 hours in this game, so obviously I enjoyed it at one point. This used to be my favorite game and I would play it for several hours every day. But now it's a honestly such a terrible game and is only getting worse, and let me tell you why.
The game is centered around the idea of a killer and 4 survivors with the killer in the dominant role. There are various killers to choose from that all have cool unique abilities, but the problem is that the killer is no longer the dominant role, making the survivors both the group AND the dominant role. It started out correctly, it was buggy but it was done right with the killers actually being scary. As of now there have been so many survivor buffs and killer nerfs that playing killer is a joke and isn't fun anymore. Being a killer main I have personally experienced this gradual degression into nothingness that the developers of the game have enforced.
The other main problem is that the developers are the most disconnected people that I have ever seen, completely ingoring the blatently obvious problems that there game has. They focus gameplay around lower level survivors which means more experienced players are almost impossible to kill. The killer nerfs have gotten so bad that even the survivor side of the community is complaining, and that's saying something. Usually the survivors are pretty toxic, so for them to recognize a problem on the killer end of things should have been a wake up call to the developers, but to no avail.
To end this I would like to quote one of the developers who was asked the question "Do you have any ideas on how you are going to impove the killer experience?"  This was responded to with "Maybe try survivor for a bit, or play something else for like a week. Try civilization or something." This was literally a developer saying that they aren't going to fix the obvious balance issues that there game has. I hope that in the future this game will be fixed and will once again be a magnificent and unique horror game, but for now please avoid it for your own sake.
玩到500小时丢档了！ 然后官方10天给了我补偿 真的很良心~

Dead by Daylight is such a unique game- you can experience the game from both the chaser (killer) or the chased (survivor) POV. 
Quite a simple concept but requires team play, strategy (sort of), and luck. Being a multiplayer game, you can play with friends (and even kill your friends!)
One thing though- I do recommend starting as a survivor. Once you understand the game mechanics, then try playing the killer- You will definitely suffer as a novice killer!

I know it's kind of a meme for a player to have hundreds and thousands of hours to give a game a negative review, but hear me out.

Dead by Daylight is absolutely the worst game that I can't stop playing. I would never wish this absolute torture of a game upon anyone. The game is fun about 20% of the time and that 20% keeps you going, ignorantly hoping for more. The game has always been an absolute mess since it's release date in 2016, yet it somehow works and it baffles me how it's not dead and how I'm still here playing. I could go on for hours about how many terrible decisions I've seen the devs make. I'm sure they're all lovely people in real life but I cannot recommend this game to anyone.

However, there is no denying this game is incredibly fun when things work or when playing with friends. Truth is: I kind of love this game, but I most definitely cannot recommend it.

A survival horror game where you play as a part of a team of survivors or a killer, each with their own special perks. The goal is to work as a team to survive, thwart the killer's obstacles, and to save your friends (or abandon them to open the hatch). To survive the night you must fix enough generators to open up the exit gates, but be careful since each killer also has their own unique ability (this does not include facecamping). 

The main complaint I have heard about this game is that it gets repetitive, since the only way to win is to fix the generators and open the gate. Yet, I don't believe this to be true, since the combination of perks you use (as survivor or killer) really make up the gameplay. If you get bored, you can play a different killer, use different perks, play a different strategy... etc.

My main problem with the game that really prompted my negative review is the fact that there are updates every couple weeks and they take FOREVER. No other game takes this long. I'm in the middle of an update that is 18.7 MB. No big deal right? It says it's going to take 20 minutes because every time it Preallocates room, actually downloads the update, and then take 15 minutes to "Update"!!!! for a few MBs!!!! It's maxing out  my Disk usage right now at over 40MB/s. There is no reason for this. I can't justify it. I keep trying to give this game a chance, but somehow updates have to  consume my computer's utilities for 20 minutes for minor fixes. Imagine when  they make big updates....

First things first, the game is fun. Playing with friends, either suriving with them or killing them, is great fun. Solo is also good sometimes, unless you are an unexperienced killer.
That's where problems usually pop up in the community. The killer winning is purely dependant on the survivors. That isn't to say that killers will always lose, but only most of the time when put aganist decent survivors. [i]I should stop talking about this aspect as there is already enough discussion going on.[/i]

DLC is mostly unnecessary, as the most powerful killers are free and you can get the survivor/killer perks from the Shrine Of Secrets, an ingame feature.

Overall, I will give this a thumbs-up, though this is only another chance for the devs to continue developing and hopefully bring back the good state of the game.

Играю за выживших основной целью является 5 генераторов из 7,которые вам надо завести,чтобы подать питания двум воротам,открыть и успеть убежать,выграв таким образом игру.У выживжих есть приимущество - это доски,которые вы можете скидывать на маньяка,и оконные проемы,через которые вы быстро сможете убежать от маньяка,но  Dead by daylight - это игра в которой надо играть сообща,тоесть:Заводить генераторы,спасать с крюка,хилить и всего прочего
Играю за маньяка основной целью ялвяются выжившие,которых надо насаживать на крюк,чтобы сделать жертвоприношение для сущности.Ему видны все ауры генераторов,где он может и поймать выживжих.
Но и у выживжих и у маньяка есть свои силы и улучшения к ним.Каждый маньяк будет со своей силой,а выживжие могут брать:аптечки,фонарики,ящики с инструментами.

Le jeu est sympa addictif, de nombreux bug assez drole par ci par là. Mais globalement ça va, si on comprend que les Dev sont des quiches.

Le seul HUGE point négatif à mes yeux : Les russes... et tout ce qui s'approche de cette communauté toxic. TOXIC. Quand vous allez vous faire camp = Russe. Face camp ? Russe. Tunnel ?? Bah russe. Combo tunnel camp face camp et si jamais en fin de partie t'avais un espoir d'ouvrir la porte est partir ? Noed made in russian !
Worth the $10 during sale.
